name: @villa/contracts
description: Villa Solidity contracts for Base network

scripts.build: command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1 && forge build || echo 'Skipping: forge not installed'
scripts.test: command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1 && forge test || echo 'Skipping: forge not installed'
scripts.test:coverage: command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1 && forge coverage || echo 'Skipping: forge not installed'
scripts.clean: command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1 && forge clean || echo 'Skipping: forge not installed'
